select a.*,c.*,d.*,b.USERNAME as TONAME,to_char(BEGINTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ABEGINTIME,to_char(TDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ATDATE from tb_loans a join tb_user b on a.userId=b.id join tb_userinformation c on b.id=c.userid join tb_loanstype d on d.loansId=a.loansId
and a.loansId=#{loansId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_investment values(seq_tb_investment_id.nextval,(select id from tb_user where userName = #{userName}),#{loansId},#{investmentMoney},sysdate,#{interestrate},#{earnings})
mapper.select: select investmentId from tb_investment where userId =(select id from tb_user where userName = #{userName}) and loansId = #{loansId}
mapper.update: update tb_loans set investmentamount = investmentamount+ #{investmentMoney} where loansId = #{loansId}
mapper.select: select investmentmoney,to_char(investmentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as investmentdate,(select userName from tb_user where id=a.userid) as userName from tb_investment a join tb_user b on b.id=a.userid where loansId = #{loansId}

select b.certification,b.availmoney from tb_userinformation a join tb_useraccount b on a.userinformationid = b.userinformationid where a.userid = (select id from tb_user where userName = #{userName} )
